title: In ‘From Scratch,’ the Locke Sisters Tell a Story of Love, Loss and Food
description: For the new Netflix series, Tembi Locke joined forces with her younger sister, Attica, a successful novelist and TV writer, to adapt her own memoir.
dc:creator: Chris Vognar
media:credit: Ryan Pfluger for The New York Times
media:description: Having lived the source material of their Netflix series, “From Scratch,” Tembi Locke, left, and her sister, Attica, had to find a balance between respecting the facts and telling a good story.
